control.name: ceMain
control.description: The EnableMasterViewMode property specifies whether or not View details can be displayed. To specify whether or not a View group panel should act as a joined group panel use the ShowChildrenInGroupPanel property.

control.name: ceTabs
control.description: The ShowDetailTabs property specifies whether detail tabs are displayed in detail sections when master rows of the current master View are expanded.

control.name: ceToolTips
control.description: Specifies whether detail tooltips are enabled for detail Views that are opened via the current master View.

control.name: imageComboBoxEdit1
control.description: Zooming allows you to maximize immediate View details to fit the entire grid control area. This can be performed automatically (if the AutoZoomDetail property equals true) or by an end-user clicking the zoom button at runtime.

control.name: seVertIndent
control.description: The DetailVerticalIndent property gets or sets the distance between master rows and Detail Sections, in pixels.
